RR_verdict: The On Cloudmonster is the brand's max-cushioned running shoe that blew our minds. From firm to forgiving, it's a new take that we are confident is perfect for daily training and long runs. True to its name, it has a monstrous amount of foam that keeps our feet protected and comfy all day. So much so that we can take it out on our walks as well.
